heading: Wednesday Night
text: A rising chance of late-night snow showers north

heading: Thursday, Christmas Day
temperature: Mid 20s to mid 30s, north to south, falling after noon

heading: Friday
temperature: Single digits to lower teens north, mid teens to lower 20s south

heading: Saturday
text: Chance of light snow south and west of I-89.
temperature: Mid teens to lower 20s north, mid to upper 20s south
